title: ‘Built to Fail’? Why TerraUSD’s Growth Is Giving Finance Experts Nightmares - CoinDesk
content: ‘Built to Fail’? Why TerraUSD’s Growth Is Giving Finance Experts Nightmares  CoinDesk
description: The Terra/Luna blockchain is growing at a blinding pace. At its heart, according to some critics, is a ticking time bomb.
